mapper.select: SELECT LCTR_RPRS.LCTR_SEQ, LCTR_RPRS.LCTR_TTL, LCTR_RPRS.INSTR_NM, LCTR_RPRS.LCTR_CN, LCTR_RPRS.LCTR_KND, LCTR_RPRS.REG_YMD, LCTR_SEQ.PRGRS_RT, LCTR_SEQ.VDO_URL_ADDR, LCTR_SEQ.SEQ, LCTR_SEQ.LCTR_OBJT, MBR.USER AS GENERAL_USER FROM kit.LCTR_RPRS JOIN kit.LCTR_SEQ ON LCTR_RPRS.LCTR_SEQ = LCTR_SEQ.LCTR_SEQ JOIN kit.MBR ON LCTR_SEQ.EML_ADDR = MBR.EML_ADDR WHERE LCTR_SEQ.EML_ADDR = #{emlAddr}
